title: Secrets of Prince Andrew
overview: Secrets of Prince Andrew tells the inside story of Andrew's scandal-plagued life, including the disastrous BBC Newsnight interview in November 2019 that shook the monarchy to its core. This definitive Prince Andrew biography features the twists and turns of Palace intrigue, secret conversations, and looks at the Queen's involvement in the repercussions following the BBC Newsnight revelations. With exclusive interviews and unprecedented access, the program provides a unique perspective on the Prince's life, offering an in-depth look at the chain of events that led to his downfall.
